info.name: RFID Jewelry Inventory System - Complete API Collection v3
info.description: Complete API collection for RFID Jewelry Inventory Management System with Multi-Tenant Architecture, Product Management, Image Upload, RFID Tracking, Comprehensive Reporting System, RFID Usage Analytics, and Database Management. All endpoints with real data examples and proper localhost URLs.

body.raw:
{
  "userName": "admin@jewelrystore.com",
  "email": "admin@jewelrystore.com",
  "password": "Admin@123",
  "fullName": "John Doe",
  "mobileNumber": "+91-9876543210",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "address": "123 Jewelry Street, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India",
  "organisationName": "Premium Jewelry Store",
  "showroomType": "Premium"
}
